breakfast.title: Egg Bruschetta with tomato
breakfast.items: 1 whole meal slices ,1 egg ,9ml vegetable oil ,4 cherry tomatoes ,12 g Parmesan
breakfast.directions: 1. In a bowl, dip beat the egg, and then combine egg, cheese and salt.2. Dip the bread slices into the egg mixture.3. Place 9ml oil in a pan and put the bread slices to fry for 2 mins each side. Then remove bread and set aside.4. Place the garlic, and tomatoes on the pan and cook for 3 mins while stirring occasionally.5. Top the bread with the cherry tomato mixture and sprinkle the fresh basil.6. Top off with salt and pepper if desired.

lunch.title: Chickpea pesto Pasta salad

dinner.title: Mexican tofu with avocado and broccoli

dinner.directions: Place 12 ml of vegetable oil in a pan and cook the tofu and chopped broccoli on medium/high heat until goldenServe the tofu and broccoli mix with sliced avocado, cilantro, lime/lemon juice and chili powder.Place 35g sour cream and serve

lunch.title: Chicken Wrap

dinner.title: Chickpea avocado rice salad

dinner.directions: Boil the basmati rice as instructed by packet.Place 12ml of vegetable oil in a medium high heat pan, place the chickpeas and let to cook for 3 mins and then add the chopped cherry tomatoes and the cooked rice.Place the mixture in a plate and top off with the avocado and salad cream.

snack1.title: Roasted chickpeas

snack1.directions: In a bowl, mix 8ml of vegetable oil on the chickpeas and add salt, pepper and seasoning of choiceSpread evenly on a dish and cook for a few mins in the oven on medium high heat.

lunch.title: Chicken & Broccoli Couscous
lunch.items: 125g Uncooked chicken breast ,45g uncooked couscous ,100g chopped broccoli ,10 chopped almonds ,12ml vegetable oilSalt & pepper
lunch.directions: Cook the couscous according to packet instructionsSeason chopped chicken breast with salt and pepper.Meanwhile, Place 15ml of vegetable oil in a medium high heat.Place the chopped almonds on the pan and cook for 2/3 mins while stirring occasionally. Put almonds to the side and cook the chicken breast.When chicken breast is almost cooked, add in the pan the cooked quinoa, chopped broccoli (you can boil/steam the broccoli if you prefer it to be softer), the almonds and cook for 2/3 mins while occasionally stirring.Serve üòä

dinner.title: Beef quinoa and vegetables

dinner.directions: Cook the quinoa as stated by packet instructionsMeanwhile place 12ml of vegetable oil in a medium/high heat pan and let the finely chopped carrots to cook for 2 mins, then add the beef and broccoli and let it cook for 4 mins.Add the cooked quinoa in the pan with the rest of the ingredients and let to cook for another minute while stirring occasionally.

breakfast.title: Peanut butter & jam toast
breakfast.directions: Can be served toasted if preferred

lunch.title: Salmon with Rice and vegetables

dinner.title: Beef with Potatoes and vegetables

dinner.directions: 1. Preheat the grill to high heat and add 1 kcal oil spray2. Sprinkle the beef strips generously with salt and pepper and put in the pan to cook3. After 3 mins, add the chopped broccoli and cauliflower together with the beef strips and cook for another 3 mins or until cooked to your liking4. White potato can be boiled, cooked in an airfryer or in the oven. Use salt and pepper and choice of herbs to season.5. Serve all ingredients together, sprinkle 25g Parmesan on top and enjoy!

breakfast.title: Cheesy omelet toast

Add salt, pepper and herbs of choice.3. Put the mixture in the pan and cook for 1-2 mins each side.4. Toast the bread (optional), Fill the toast with omelet and slice cheese and serve.

breakfast.title: Omelette with garlic butter

dinner.title: Turkey stuffed bell peppers
dinner.items: 100g Uncooked minced turkey ,40g uncooked basmati rice ,1  Whole bell pepper  (seeds and top removed)160ml Tomato sauce ,22g Shredded Cheddar ,1/2 shredded medium onionSalt, pepper and smoked paprika
dinner.directions: Cook the basmati rice according to packet instructions.Meanwhile, Put some 1 kcal light spray on a medium high heat pan, fry the chopped onions for 2 mins, and add the minced turkey (seasoned with salt pepper and smoked paprika) to cook for another 4 mins while occasionally stirring.Add the tomato sauce in the pan and continue cooking for a 2 mins and remove from pan from heat.Add the shredded cheddar and the cooked rice to the mixture and mix properly.Stuff the bell pepper, Put in a baking dish, cover in foil and bake in the over for another 25 mins.

dinner.title: Sun dried tomatoes, mozzarella and spinach stuffed Chicken breast
dinner.items: 165g Chicken breast ,32g Mozzarella ,4 pieces sun dried tomato (not in oil!)6.56 large chopped olives ,1 cup spinach ,100g Broccoli ,100g Cauliflower ,10ml Vegetable oil

lunch.directions: Season the chopped chicken breast generously with salt, pepper and seasoning (smoked paprika or bacon flavoured seasoning is our favourite!)Put a pan on medium high heat and place 12ml of vegetable oil and let the chicken to cookMeanwhile, do the coleslaw mix by mixing approximately ¬Ω cup of plain coleslaw with 15g Mayonnaise and 15g Sweet Chilli sauceOpen 1 large tortilla wrap and place some leafy green, top it off with the coleslaw mix and the cooked chicken and wrap it up! üòä

dinner.title: Ribeye Steak with vegetables
dinner.items: 150g Ribeye ,1 cup broccoli ,1 cup Cauliflower ,Salt and pepper to taste
dinner.directions: Season the Ribeye Generously with salt and pepperPut a pan on high heat, cook the Ribeye to your personal preference using 1 kcal spray. You can also BBQ the Ribeye without any oil at all! (Ribeye has a good amount of fat in it!)Boil the vegetables for 4 mins to soften them a bit and serve along side with the Ribeye. You can ‚Äúfry‚Äù the vegetables in 1 Kcal spray (or on the same pan where you cooked the Ribeye) if you prefer your vegetables this way!Feel free to season your vegetables with salt, pepper and spices of choice!

snack1.title: Flavoured Greek Yogurt & Blue berries
snack1.items: 1 small pot Flavoured Delta Greek yogurt

breakfast.title: Tofu Scramble
breakfast.items: 80g Hard tofu ,¬º medium Medium avocado ,10 ml vegetable oil ,¬Ω Medium Onion ,¬Ω tsp chilli flakes ,¬º tsp turmeric ,¬º tsp smoked paprika ,¬º tsp garlic powder ,Salt to your preference
breakfast.directions: Set a pan on medium high heat and drizzle 10ml of vegetable oil in itAdd the chopped onion and mix properly and immediately add all the spices and let to cook together with the onion for 2/3 minsAdd the diced tofu in the onion mixture and stir well until all tofu is covered with spices. Cook until tofu is warm throughout.

lunch.title: Chicken Pesto Pasta salad

A few mins before pasta is cooked, add the broccoli let boil a bit to soften.Meanwhile, season the diced chicken with salt and pepper and cook on high heat in a pan using 1 kcal oil sprayIn a bowl, Mix the pasta, broccoli, chicken, pesto sauce (accurately measured!) and crushed walnuts and mix together.Serve and enjoy üòä

dinner.title: Grilled Salmon fillet with Rice and vegetables
dinner.items: 115g Salmon fillet ,40g Uncooked rice ,1 tsp coconut sugar ,1 cup chopped broccoli ,50g Carrot (1 medium) ,12ml vegetable oil ,Salt and pepper
dinner.directions: Pre-heat the grill to high heatBrush fillet with oil, salt, pepper and coconut sugar and grill for 2-3 min each side and set aside when readyPrepare the rice according to packet instructions and set asideIn a wok pan, put some cooking spray and cook the chopped broccoli and carrot, add some salt and pepper or seasonings of choice and let to cook for about 5 minutes.Remove vegetables from pan and serve alongside with salmon and rice üòä

breakfast.title: Egg and feta Toast

breakfast.directions: Cook the egg in a medium high heat pan using 1 kcal oil spray.Toast the bread and top it with leafy greens, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese and the egg. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and chilli flakes (optional!)

lunch.title: Smoked salmon and Shrimp salad
lunch.items: 120g Shrimp ,50g Smoked salmon ,1 ¬Ω  tbsp Sunflower seeds ,40g Sweet corn ,6 large olives ,¬º  medium avocado ,6 cherry tomatoes80g bell pepper ,80g cucumber ,10ml vegetable oil ,Salt, pepper and chilli flakes (optional)1 tsp lemon juice1 cups leafy greens or shredded lettuce
lunch.directions: In a medium heat pan, put the accurately weighed vegetable oil and cook the shrimps. Add salt and pepper and chili flakes (optional) and set aside.Prepare a bed of leafy greens on a salad bowl and top up with all salad ingredients including the smoked salmon and the shrimps and serve üòä

dinner.title: Chicken, Quinoa and vegetables
dinner.items: 130g Chicken breast ,45g uncooked quinoa ,40g Canned corn ,¬Ω  cup green beans ,1 cup broccoli ,12ml vegetable oil8 cherry tomatoes ,1 tsp smoked paprika ,1 tsp cayenne pepper ,¬Ω tsp Cajun seasoning ,1 tsp stevia
dinner.directions: Set a pan on medium-high heat and put 12ml (accurately measured) of oil. Put the chopped chicken (seasoned with salt and pepper) to cook for 3-4 mins and then reduce heat to low.Add the finely chopped tomatoes, corn, and all the spices and stevia and continue stirring.Add ¬º cup water and the quinoa portion to the pan and continue cooking for another 20-25 mins while stirring occasionally.Steam or boil the broccoli and green beans to the side and when done serve with the quinoa and chicken mix!
dinner.tip: You can add the broccoli and green beans mix together with the quinoa when you add water on the same pan if you wish to save on prep time!

snack1.items: You can enjoy this snack with some tea/coffee with a splash of skimmed milk and sweetener (optional)
